short_summary: Access to an online portal for geopolitical analysis relating to national security
description: An ACAN is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities. ...
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
================#
### **Government Tender Notice**

#### **Reference:** PW-22-01013640

#### **Publication Date:** November 16, 2022

#### **Closing Date:** November 30, 2022, at 14:00 hours EST

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) intends to award a contract for the provision of an online, web-based portal that provides daily geopolitical analysis on national security, irregular migration patterns, human trafficking and smuggling, and ongoing country-specific human rights issues. The analysis will be provided to CBSA users through a robust methodology and a global network, not collected by the CBSA or other Government of Canada agencies at the unclassified level.

#### **Contract Period:**
The contract will be for an initial period from the contract award date to December 31, 2023, with two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

#### **Requirements:**

* The contractor must provide daily geopolitical analysis to CBSA users.
* The analysis must be provided through a web-based portal.
* The analysis must be based on a robust methodology and global network.
* The contractor must not collect the analysis data on behalf of the CBSA or other Government of Canada agencies.

#### **Trade Agreements:**
The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### **Contact Information:**

* Name: Tammy Otoole
* Email: tammy.otoole@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-551-6922

#### **Attachments:**
* The tender documentation can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/16/6d940fda1935c0a4e5d2d4226842ac14/1000400913_acan_en.pdf
